---
title: "Cortex Ratio and Density analysis"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
accumulation<-read.csv("AccumulationModel AccumulationModel-table.csv",stringsAsFactors = FALSE,skip=6)
occupation<-read.csv("OccupationModel OccupationModel-table.csv",stringsAsFactors = FALSE,skip=6)

accumulation<-subset(accumulation,levy_mu==1)
occupation<-subset(occupation,walkers==100)
acc_a<-subset(accumulation,carry_in==0)
occ_a<-subset(occupation,carry_in==0)


plot(log(occ_a[,10]),occ_a[,7],pch=4,ylim=c(0,1),xlab="Log Density",ylab="Cortex Ratio")
points(log(acc_a[,10]),acc_a[,7],pch=2)

```
